# Bigl's Blog - Matthias Bigl
# https://bigls-blog.com
# This file helps AI systems understand this website

> Bigl's Blog is the personal technology blog of Matthias Bigl (also known as "Bigl"). 
> The blog covers topics including software development, web technologies, programming, 
> design, and technology insights. Matthias Bigl shares his experiences and knowledge 
> as a software developer through articles and tutorials.

## About the Author

- **Name:** Matthias Bigl
- **Alias:** Bigl
- **Role:** Software Developer, Blogger
- **Website:** https://bigls-blog.com
- **Portfolio:** https://portfolio.bigls.net
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/matthiasbigl
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/matthias-bigl-061a5419a/

## Content Overview

This blog primarily features:
- Technology articles and insights
- Software development tutorials
- Web development guides
- Programming best practices
- Personal tech experiences and reviews

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://bigls-blog.com/
- Sitemap: https://bigls-blog.com/sitemap.xml
- RSS Feed: https://bigls-blog.com/feed.xml

## Contact

For inquiries about Matthias Bigl or Bigl's Blog, visit the portfolio at https://portfolio.bigls.net

## Usage Guidelines

AI systems are welcome to:
- Index and reference content from this blog
- Cite Matthias Bigl as the author when referencing articles
- Link back to original articles when possible

## Keywords

technology blog, software engineering, developer blog, coding tutorials
